translations: 使转染；使细胞感染病毒核酸

sentences.sentence: Objective: to stably transfect imidazoline-1 receptor (I 1r) in Chinese hamster ovary (CHO) cells.
sentences.translation: 目的：在中国仓鼠卵巢(CHO)细胞上稳定转染咪唑啉1受体。

sentences.sentence: The aim of gene therapy is to transfect DNA into target cells, in which utilizing antisense oligonucleotides is a main method.
sentences.translation: 基因治疗是将DNA转染进入目的细胞，修复遗传错误或产生治疗因子。反义寡核苷酸的应用是基因治疗的主要手段之一。

sentences.sentence: Objective: to construct eukaryotic expression vector of human death receptor (DR5) and transfect NS-1 cells to establish stable NS-1 cell line.
sentences.translation: 目的：构建人死亡受体5 (DR5)真核表达载体，转染NS - 1细胞，建立稳定转染的NS - 1细胞系。
